summary: The implementation successfully addresses all requirements for adding unique labour IDs, mobile number fields, and fixing outgoing bookings display. Backend changes include labour ID generation, mobile number validation, and migration support. Frontend changes add mobile number inputs/displays across ProfilePage, DiscoveryPage, and BookingDetailPage, along with comprehensive logging in BookingsDashboard and query invalidation improvements in useQueries. All requirements appear to be fully implemented with appropriate validation and error handling.
